mapper.sql: id, orderId, hsId, invoiceDirection, invoiceType, openDate, openCompanyId, recieverId, tsc
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id t1Id, t2.id t2Id, t1.orderId, t1.hsId, t1.invoiceDirection, t1.invoiceType, t1.openDate, t1.openCompanyId, t1.recieverId, t1.tsc, t2.invoiceId, t2.invoiceNumber, t2.cargoAmount, t2.taxRate, t2.priceAndTax, t2.tsc t2tsc FROM hs_ying_invoice t1 LEFT JOIN hs_ying_invoice_detail t2 ON t1.id = t2.invoiceId WHERE t1.id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT t1.id t1Id, t2.id t2Id, t1.orderId, t1.hsId, t1.invoiceDirection, t1.invoiceType, t1.openDate, t1.openCompanyId, t1.recieverId, t1.tsc, t2.invoiceId, t2.invoiceNumber, t2.cargoAmount, t2.taxRate, t2.priceAndTax, t2.tsc t2tsc FROM hs_ying_invoice t1 LEFT JOIN hs_ying_invoice_detail t2 ON t1.id = t2.invoiceId WHERE t1.orderId = #{orderId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hs_ying_invoice ( id, orderId, hsId, invoiceDirection, invoiceType, openDate, openCompanyId, recieverId, tsc ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{invoiceDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{openCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recieverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into hs_ying_invoice
id, orderId, hsId, invoiceDirection, invoiceType, openDate, openCompanyId, recieverId, tsc,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{invoiceDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{openCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recieverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update: UPDATE hs_ying_invoice SET orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hsId = #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, invoiceDirection = #{invoiceDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoiceType = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, openDate = #{openDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, openCompanyId = #{openCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, recieverId = #{recieverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, tsc = #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
